titleStmt.title: An Apologie for Mr. Iohn Goodwin: who having subscribed proposalls to be presented to the magistrate concerning matters of religion; after that, makes 30 Queries, whether it be the magistrates duty to interpose his authoritie in matters of religion.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright, at the Kings Head in the Old-Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old-Bayley
